EMPTY_FIRST_NAME_ERROR_MESSAGE: First name must not be empty.
NOT_VALID_FIRST_NAME_ERROR_MESSAGE: The first name introduced is not valid. It must not contain numbers nor special characters (./-_*? etc).
NOT_VALID_LAST_NAME_ERROR_MESSAGE: The last name introduced is not valid. It must not contain numbers nor special characters (./-_*? etc).
TOO_LONG_USERNAME_ERROR_MESSAGE: Username is too long, it must not exceed 32 characters.
TOO_SHORT_USERNAME_ERROR_MESSAGE: Username is too short, it must contain 2 or more characters.
NOT_VALID_USERNAME_ERROR_MESSAGE: The username introduced is not valid.
NOT_VALID_PASSWORD_ERROR_MESSAGE: The password introduced is not valid. It must contain 1 upper case letter, 1 lower case letter, 1 number, 1 special character of the following (#?!@$%^&*-_) and at least be 8 characters long.
NOT_VALID_EMAIL_ERROR_MESSAGE: The email introduced is not valid.
TOO_LONG_PHONE_NUMBER_ERROR_MESSAGE: The phone number is too long, it must not exceed 32 digits.
NOT_VALID_PHONE_NUMBER_ERROR_MESSAGE: Phone number is not valid, it must be at least 4 digits long with a maximum of 32, and not contain letters nor whitespaces.
CONFIRMATION_PASSWORD_DIFFERENT_FROM_PAS: Password confirmation does not match the password previously specified.
USER_REGISTRATION_UNKNOW_ERROR: An unknown error has occurred, please try again.
USER_REGISTRATION_NETWORK_TIMEOUT_ERROR: A network error has occurred, please check your internet connection status and try again.
